text: IT Security Analyst IT Security Analyst IT Security Analyst - Inter-Con Security Systems Inc Washington, DC To obtain a position in Information Security in a growth-oriented organization with a focus on Risk Management Framework (RMF), risk assessment, A&A, FISMA, and SP 800-53 control assessments.

Work Experience IT Security Analyst Inter-Con Security Systems Inc - Washington, DC 2016 to Present Conducts FIPS-199 categorization using SP 800-60 and control selections utilizing NIST SP 800-53 for the client, develops test plans; and testing procedures.

Documenting, testing, and reviewing Access Control implemented by system administrators through interviews, screenshots, etc. Contributes to providing Awareness and Training (AT) to ensure clients are equipped to maintain adequate security.
Supervises and monitors the FISMA testing of the client's systems.

Prepares and reviews security documentations including System Security Plans (SSP), Security Assessment Reports (SAR), Contingency Plan (CP), Privacy Impact Analysis (PIA), and other artifact required for system's security.
Supports the remediation actions to correct assessment findings and develops supporting Plan Of Action and Milestone (POA&M) reports.
Organizes authorization package for ATO of the client's systems.
Utilizing vulnerability scanning to detect and prioritize potential weaknesses allowing client to implement corrective actions.
Supports the penetration testing group with information gathering (reconnaissance) and scanning using Nessus and Nmap tools.

Pathways Internship Program ( IT Support Specialist) US Department of State - Systems Oversight Division - Washington, DC 2011 to 2016 Installed and configured Active Directory, Group Policy, Windows Deployment Services, creating Boot and Capture Images, using the Server Manager in Windows Server 2012 R2.

text: Analyzed and applied account lockout policies.

(Personnel HR Actions, Separations, New Hires, etc.) Created Civil Service, Overseas, Foreign Service, and Temporary Foreign Service Assignment Job Codes in the GEMS Application (Human Resources system for managing personnel and payroll activities).
